comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This is a fantastic pic of a handpiece. One of these I'd say - www.nma.gov.au/collections-search/display?irn=123537. Note the oil can and scrubbing brush.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Also see www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=29806 where there is a good view of the under side of the handpiece.
